entry.title: Charcoal Hair Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Hair Mask
Price: 29.99

Dirty Bee | Hair Mask

Charcoal: Unisex scent of woodys and moroccan scent

Dirty Bee Hair Mask is a perfect mask that neutralizes and perfects lightened, cool blonde, bleached, or grey hair. Professional blonde color care right from the comfort of your home.  This mask neutralizes unwanted brassy and yellow undertones. Dirty Bee Hair Mask is perfect for strengthening and resurfacing fiber damage for a flawless blonde result!  You will be AMAZED!

Ingredents: Water, Shea Butter, Stearic Acid, Jojoba Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth 20, Glycerin, Almond Oil, Argan Oil, Amla Oil, Cyclomethicone, Lavandin Essential Oil, Lemon Essential Oil, Lime Essential Oil, Litsea Essential Oil, D&C Violet 2, Gentian Violet, Polysorbate 80

Made in USA
